_header: It befell some time in certain / In the City of Thessaly
_description: ‘De Theodosio Imperatore’, in the Vernon Golden Legend — in short couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HIt bifel sum tyme in certeynIn þe Cite of
                    Tessaleyn…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of þis lyf is þer no moreGod ȝif vs grace to
                    beo not lore
